main.name: Muhammadreza Heydarian
main.description: With more than six years of experience as a software developer and 1.5 years as a full-stack developer. Loving to solve challenging problems and learning new technologies.
main.bio: MSc graduate of software engineering from the Sharif University of Technology, with more than six years of experience as a software developer and 1.5 years as a full-stack developer. Having worked with technologies including but not limited to Python, Java Android, JS, PHP, Angular, React-Native, and NodeJS. A fluent English speaker. Loving to solve challenging problems and learning new technologies.
main.contactmessage: Soon, you will be able to contact me directly using the form below, but for now, please use the links above.

resume.skillmessage: Familiar and experienced with a wide range of front and back end technologies and skills necessary for a developer

description: Thesis title: A real-time and energy-efficient infrastructure for computation offloading in IoT

description: Published app: RealMadridiha mobile client
Published app: Islahweb mobile client

Published app: SMART TRAINING AND FLASHCARD FORMATION SYSTEM (STAFFS) - A training system for parsing Wikipedia and extracting glossary then presenting it to users in an android app based on their examination results
All apps published on Cafe Bazaar an Iranian Android Store (Some of the App may not currently be available)
Used technologies: Java (Android)

project.title: Deployment of a tr069 provisioning system
project.about: Deployment of a complete auto-provisioning system for a VOIP server, including tr069 CPE and tr069 ACS
description: FreeACS is used as the server
EasyCWMP in OpenWRT is used as the client
Under the supervision of Dr. Mohsen Safavi

project.title: VOIP client for android using PJSIP
project.about: The compilation, embedding and debugging of PJSIP VOIP implementation in android in order to develop an android client to be used in a VOIP telephone system. Written in Java Android and C
description: Under the supervision of Dr. Mohsen Safavi

project.title: Private Teacher Startup system
project.about: A startup to connect students and private teachers
description: The system consists of three parts: Server, mobile client and admin panel
Mobile Client, developed using React-Native
Admin Panel, developed using Angular

project.title: Android-based system for drone control using image processing
project.about: Controlling a DJI quadrotor using a laser beam having a special signal (similar to Talon missiles), to facilitate guiding drones for people unfamiliar with drone standard controllers
description: Using OpenCV for image and signal processing
Using DJI SDK for drone control
Under the supervision of Dr. Jafargholi, faculty of Amir Kabir University of technology

project.title: RC CAR
project.about: A radio-controlled toy car being controlled from an android app developed using Arduino C++ API and Java Android
description: All electronics are done using Arduino peripherals including servo, wifi transceiver, etc
The wireless control mechanism uses UDP packets

project.title: SIMPYTHON
project.about: A mini engine for simulating discrete event scenarios written in python
description: Inventory system simulations
Queue system simulations
Presenting complete simulation statistics both graphically and numerical
An API for designing simulation systems
GitHub link: https://github.com/mrhsce/simPython

project.title: GCM SERVER
project.about: Google cloud messaging server for sending the notification to android app clients written in PHP
description: Able to send messages to hundreds of thousands of clients
Serving 150k clients in Sep 2015

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
